<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Instinctive Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=1616) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 110 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Acute Scent](/Feats.aspx?ID=135) or precise or imprecise [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417)

</column>

---

You trust your instincts and your sense of smell, using all of your senses to pinpoint your opponent's location. Make a melee Strike against an opponent that isn't hiding its scent with an effect like [_negate aroma_](/Spells.aspx?ID=206). This attack ignores any flat check required due to the target being [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22).
name: Instinctive Strike
prerequisite: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
